title: PEANUT BUTTER GRANOLA BITES
directions: Mix peanut butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla together. Stir in granola and mix until just combined. Roll into small 1/2 in balls and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake for 8 minutes.
ingredients: 1 cup granola (I used Cascadian Farms Vanilla Almond Granola)
